name: Display All Image File Path
author: Justin D. Givens

sections.description: The plugin loops through all available image sizes and display it out to the users on the Edit Media screen and when you upload new content only.
sections.installation:
1. Copy the folder ‘Hierarchical-Page-View’ into the directory ‘wp-content/plugins/’.

  2. Activate the plugin.

  3. Go the Media Libray and select Edit on an Image OR Upload some new content.
sections.faq: If your question isn’t here, ask your own question at the WordPress.org forums.
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • Changed the plugin because of WordPress 3.5 changes. Now the plugin shows the different file paths on the edit media page.

1.1

  • Removed additional boxes if there isn’t file for them. Example when uploading files other than images, there won’t be additional file locations.

1.0

  • Initial upload.
